Description: Necklace (?) comprising a large number of glass beads of various shapes, colours and dimensions: including many irregularly-shaped opaque green beads with orange striations, black and white mottled barrel beads, and a large number of small translucent amber-coloured short cylinder or short truncated convex bicone beads, red, yellow, green, and blue beads are also included; a green steatite pendant, with incised decoration, is strung centrally. A number of fragmentary beads, stored separately, may also have originally formed part of this string. Fragments of a number of dark-coloured glazed composition or glass short cylinder beads.
